title: Childhood sexual abuse: four case studies
creator_credit: Dale McCulley, MTI Teleprograms and Cavalcade Productions
brief_description: In a weekend workshop setting, four women relive their experiences of early sexual molestation. Each of the women reveals a uniquely poignant story.
